title: Profiles in Soil Health: Cycle Farm Spearfish SD

subtasks: Conducting the farmers market in Spearfish Valley
Transitioning from farmers market to farm stand sales
Implementing four- and eight-year crop rotation cycles
Using no-till methods for soil management

tasks.task: Managing soil health and organic matter
subtasks: Ensuring soil remains covered with plants or mulch
Facilitating carbon dioxide absorption through photosynthesis
Enhancing soil microbiology and organic matter levels

subtasks: Operating a farm stand and supplying local restaurants

So I think this list accurately reflects the transcript's content while generalizing the tasks into maintainable categories. Each MAINTASK is a major activity, and the subtasks are the specific actions involved. There isn't anything in the transcript that seems irrelevant to physical farming tasks, so I shouldn't flag the transcript as irrelevant.
